trans-unit.source: Converts instances of <xref:System.String> to and from instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Converte istanze di <xref:System.String>in e da istanze di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This class is typically only utilized by the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter> for serialization purposes.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe viene generalmente utilizzata solo per il <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter>per scopi di serializzazione.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter>
